name: OND_Status
description: Returns LH network route status information. Search for recently added or retired routes

Accept.description: Mandatory http header:  application/xml or application/json

catalogues.description: Carrier for which the OND will be retrieved (e.g. 'LH')

new-routes.description: Enter if newly added routes should be returned in the response. (Acceptable values are: "", "true", "false")

old-routes.description: Enter if old (deleted) routes should be returned in the response. (Acceptable values are: "", "true", "false")
